mapper.select:
select pk_chargeinfo, ep_code, station_id,
ep_gun_no,
cdc_conn_battry, cdc_gun_close_status, cdc_gun_lid_status, cdc_car_conn_pile, cdc_carplace_status, cdc_card_reader_fault, cdc_urgent_stop_fault, cdc_arrester_fault, cdc_insulation_check_fault, cdc_gun_unconnect_warn, cdc_trans_record_warn, cdc_meter_error, cdc_ac_in_vol_warn, cdc_charge_over_temp, cdc_ac_current_over_load, cdc_output_relay, cdc_charger_status, cdc_output_voltage, cdc_output_current, cdc_lock_status, cdc_soc, cdc_charged_remain_time, cdc_total_active_meternum, cdc_charged_cost, cdc_price,
cdc_car_charge_mode, cdc_soc_warn, cdc_mod_sample_over_temp, cdc_out_linker_over_temp, cdc_out_linker_status, cdc_whole_over_current_warn, cdc_charge_vol_warn, cdc_single_battery_voltage, cdc_bp_max_temp, cdc_bp_min_temp, cdc_sum_battery_voltage, cdc_a_voltage, cdc_b_voltage, cdc_c_voltage, cdc_a_current, cdc_b_current, cdc_c_current, cdc_max_out_vol, cdc_min_out_vol, cdc_max_out_current, cdc_battry_errlink, cdc_fogs_warn, cdc_bms_comm_exception, cdc_dc_meter_exception,
cdc_car_charge_mode, cdc_soc_warn, cdc_mod_sample_over_temp, cdc_out_linker_over_temp, cdc_out_linker_status, cdc_whole_over_current_warn, cdc_charge_vol_warn,
cdc_single_battery_voltage, cdc_bp_max_temp, cdc_bp_min_temp, cdc_sum_battery_voltage, cdc_a_voltage, cdc_b_voltage, cdc_c_voltage, cdc_a_current, cdc_b_current, cdc_c_current, cdc_max_out_vol, cdc_min_out_vol, cdc_max_out_current, user_id, serialno, start_time, cdc_ep_temperature
from tbl_chargeinfo_dc where ep_code=#{ep_code} and ep_gun_no=#{ep_gun_no}
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_chargeinfo_dc ( ep_code, station_id, ep_gun_no,
cdc_conn_battry, cdc_gun_close_status, cdc_gun_lid_status, cdc_car_conn_pile, cdc_carplace_status, cdc_card_reader_fault, cdc_urgent_stop_fault, cdc_arrester_fault, cdc_insulation_check_fault, cdc_gun_unconnect_warn, cdc_trans_record_warn, cdc_meter_error, cdc_ac_in_vol_warn, cdc_charge_over_temp, cdc_ac_current_over_load, cdc_output_relay, cdc_charger_status, cdc_output_voltage, cdc_output_current, cdc_lock_status, cdc_soc, cdc_charged_time, cdc_charged_remain_time, cdc_total_active_meternum, cdc_charged_cost, cdc_price,
cdc_car_charge_mode, cdc_soc_warn, cdc_mod_sample_over_temp, cdc_out_linker_over_temp, cdc_out_linker_status, cdc_whole_over_current_warn, cdc_charge_vol_warn,
cdc_battry_errlink, cdc_fogs_warn, cdc_bms_comm_exception, cdc_dc_meter_exception,
cdc_single_battery_voltage, cdc_bp_max_temp, cdc_bp_min_temp, cdc_sum_battery_voltage, cdc_a_voltage, cdc_b_voltage, cdc_c_voltage, cdc_a_current, cdc_b_current, cdc_c_current, cdc_max_out_vol, cdc_min_out_vol, cdc_max_out_current, cdc_ep_temperature ) values ( #{ep_code}, #{station_id}, #{ep_gun_no}, #{linkCarStatus}, #{gunCloseStatus}, #{gunLidStatus}, #{commStatusWithCar}, #{carPlaceStatus}, #{cardReaderFault}, #{urgentStopFault}, #{arresterFault}, #{insulationCheckFault}, #{gunUnconnectWarn}, #{transRecordFullWarn}, #{meterError}, #{acInVolWarn}, #{chargeOverTemp}, #{acCurrentLoadWarn}, #{outRelayStatus}, #{workingStatus},
#{outVoltage}, #{outCurrent}, #{carPlaceLockStatus}, #{soc},
#{chargedTime}, #{chargeRemainTime}, #{totalActivMeterNum}, #{chargedCost}, #{chargePrice},
#{battryErrorLink}, #{fogsWarn}, #{bmsCommException}, #{dcMeterException},
#{carChargeMode}, #{carSocWarn}, #{chargeModSampleOverTemp}, #{chargeOutLinkerOverTemp}, #{chargeOutLinkerStatus}, #{chargeWholeOverCurrentWarn}, #{chargeVolWarn},
#{signleBattryHighVol}, #{bpHighestTemperature}, #{bpLowestTemperature}, #{carBattryTotalVol}, #{inAVol}, #{inBVol}, #{inCVol}, #{inACurrent}, #{inBCurrent}, #{inCCurrent}, #{carBattryTotalVol}, #{carBattryTotalVol}, #{outHighestCurrent}, #{epInterTemperature} )
mapper.update:
update tbl_chargeinfo_dc set cdc_conn_battry=#{linkCarStatus}, cdc_gun_close_status=#{gunCloseStatus}, cdc_gun_lid_status=#{gunLidStatus}, cdc_car_conn_pile=#{commStatusWithCar}, cdc_carplace_status=#{carPlaceStatus}, cdc_card_reader_fault=#{cardReaderFault}, cdc_urgent_stop_fault=#{urgentStopFault}, cdc_arrester_fault=#{arresterFault}, cdc_insulation_check_fault=#{insulationCheckFault}, cdc_gun_unconnect_warn=#{gunUnconnectWarn}, cdc_trans_record_warn=#{transRecordFullWarn}, cdc_meter_error=#{meterError}, cdc_ac_in_vol_warn=#{acInVolWarn}, cdc_charge_over_temp=#{chargeOverTemp}, cdc_ac_current_over_load=#{acCurrentLoadWarn}, cdc_output_relay=#{outRelayStatus}, cdc_charger_status=#{workingStatus},
cdc_output_voltage=#{outVoltage}, cdc_output_current=#{outCurrent}, cdc_lock_status=#{carPlaceLockStatus}, cdc_soc=#{soc},
cdc_charged_time=#{chargedTime}, cdc_charged_remain_time=#{chargeRemainTime}, cdc_total_active_meternum=#{totalActivMeterNum}, cdc_charged_cost=#{chargedCost}, cdc_price=#{chargePrice},
cdc_battry_errlink=#{battryErrorLink}, cdc_fogs_warn=#{fogsWarn}, cdc_bms_comm_exception=#{bmsCommException},
cdc_dc_meter_exception=#{dcMeterException}, cdc_car_charge_mode=#{carChargeMode}, cdc_soc_warn=#{carSocWarn}, cdc_mod_sample_over_temp=#{chargeModSampleOverTemp}, cdc_out_linker_over_temp=#{chargeOutLinkerOverTemp}, cdc_out_linker_status =#{chargeOutLinkerStatus}, cdc_whole_over_current_warn=#{chargeWholeOverCurrentWarn}, cdc_charge_vol_warn=#{chargeVolWarn},
cdc_single_battery_voltage=#{signleBattryHighVol}, cdc_bp_max_temp=#{bpHighestTemperature}, cdc_bp_min_temp=#{bpLowestTemperature}, cdc_sum_battery_voltage=#{carBattryTotalVol}, cdc_a_voltage=#{inAVol}, cdc_b_voltage=#{inBVol}, cdc_c_voltage=#{inCVol}, cdc_a_current=#{inACurrent}, cdc_b_current=#{inBCurrent}, cdc_c_current=#{inCCurrent}, cdc_max_out_vol=#{carBattryTotalVol}, cdc_min_out_vol=#{carBattryTotalVol}, cdc_max_out_current=#{outHighestCurrent},
chargedMeterNum=#{chargedMeterNum}, cdc_ep_temperature=#{epInterTemperature}
where ep_code=#{ep_code} and ep_gun_no=#{ep_gun_no}

update tbl_chargeinfo_dc set start_time=#{chargeStartTime}, start_dl=#{chargeStartMeterNum}, user_id=#{chargeUserId}, serialno=#{chargeSerialNo}, fronzeAmt=#{fronzeAmt} where
ep_code=#{ep_code} and ep_gun_no=#{ep_gun_no}
